patterns: How can I participate in the duicussion forums?
responses: You can access the discussion forum through the course page and start participation in ongoing discussions or you can start a new discussion by clicking on the 'Start new Discussion' button.

patterns: I'm having a trouble accessing my course materials. How can I solve it?
Why I can not access my courses?
responses: Please try clearing your browser cache

patterns: How can I enroll to a course?
How can I get access to a course?
responses: Dash board -> Name of the course -> Click on it -> Click on 'Enroll Me' button. If it requires an enrollment key, please get the key from you lecturer or Enter your course name here
Course categries -> Subject -> Select your Academic year -> Go to the relevant course -> Enroll OR Enter your course name here

patterns: How to submit an assignment through the LMS?
responses: Login to your LMS Account -> My Courses -> Course Page -> Click on the Assignment submission portal -> Click 'Add Submission' button -> Select Files/ Drag and drop the file in the submission area -> Save Submission
